result.eng: All the names were listed on the page.
result.ga: Bhí na hainmneacha go léir liostaithe ar an leathanach
result.orig: Bhí na hainmneacha go léir liostaithe ar an leathanach
result.html: Bhí na hainmneacha go léir liostaithe ar an leathanachAll the names were listed on the page.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na hainmneaċa go léir liostaiṫe ar an leaṫanaċAll the names were listed on the page.

result.eng: Also, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ga: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.orig: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.html: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁinic fosta gur maslaí ó ḋaoine le hainmneaċa cleite a ḃíoḋ mar ṫoraḋ ar na tuairimí a noċt blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
